item.title: Friend Tech Suffers Data Leak Exposing 101K User Wallets
item.dc:creator: Kelvin Munene Murithi
item.description:
Friend.tech, a new decentralized social network, created ripples in the cryptocurrency industry by amassing $1 million in fees on the first day of operation. However, the site is under fire after an unknown Yearn Finance contributor, Banteg, revealed a significant breach of sensitive user data on GitHub. This hack discloses substantial information regarding over 101,000 individuals,

item.title: Former US SEC Chief Mocks Binance As Fiat Withdrawals Are Suspended
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:

item.title: Terra Luna Classic Proposal To Directly Burn 800 Mln USTC Officially Passed, LUNC Jumps
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The Terra Luna Classic community has passed a proposal to directly send 800 million USTC related to the Ozone protocol to the burn address. The community favors to burn these USTC tokens rather than returning them to the community pool. In response, LUNC and USTC prices are rebounding again after falling more than 10% amid

The post Terra Luna Classic Proposal To Directly Burn 800 Mln USTC Officially Passed, LUNC Jumps appeared first on CoinGape.
